name: Monstarz: Rescue Mission
description:
In the search for new friends [http://bit.ly/Monstarz] the Monstarz got caught in a blizzard, be their hero and save them from the storm!

Help the Monstarz-kind!
Download "Monstarz: Rescue Mission" for FREE!
Available on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch running iOS 8.0 or above!
